meanings.definition: Of or relating to rocks or rocky habitats.
meanings.sent1: The saxatile terrain made hiking difficult.
meanings.sent2: The saxatile plants thrived in the rocky soil.
meanings.sent3: The saxatile boulders seemed to have a secret to share.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong and unyielding as saxatile rocks.
meanings.sent5: The saxatile cliffs stood tall against the crashing waves.

meanings.sent1: The saxatile moss added a touch of green to the gray rocks.
meanings.sent2: The saxatile flowers bloomed beautifully in the crevices.
meanings.sent3: The saxatile vines played hide-and-seek among the stones.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him grew as steadily as saxatile plants on a mountainside.
meanings.sent5: The saxatile lichens painted a colorful picture on the rocky canvas.
